theme.name: Modern Tech Tool
theme.designPrinciples: Clean functionality with bold gradient accents, intuitive interface, and immediate results
theme.gradientStyle: Multi-directional gradients with vibrant color transitions and subtle mesh overlays

hero.description: Abstract gradient mesh with tech patterns

sections.description: Subtle geometric patterns with gradient overlay

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Single-page functional tool - immediate color generator interface

sections.name: Color Generator
sections.content: Full viewport color palette generator: Large interactive color wheel/picker at center, live 8-color palette display below with hex codes, copy buttons for each color, brief inline explanations (algorithm info, usage tips), export dropdown for CSS/JSON/Adobe formats

cta.label: Copy All
cta.button(s): Individual copy buttons per color, bulk copy all, export format dropdown

layouts.scrollEffects: Subtle parallax on hero, smooth scroll to generator section
layouts.backgroundImageReveals: Hero section with animated gradient mesh, generator section with clean background
layouts.extra: Focus on the color wheel/picker as the main interactive element. Real-time palette updates as user selects colors. Clean, distraction-free interface that puts the tool front and center.
